languages.text: "Приветствую, Вольный Торговец! Я хотела обратиться с личной просьбой". {n}Голос сестры Ардженты одно мгновение кажется неуверенным.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Приветствую, Вольный Торговец! Я хотела обратиться с личной просьбой". {n}Голос сестры Ардженты одно мгновение кажется неуверенным.{/n}

languages.text: "Greetings, Rogue Trader! I was hoping to approach you with a personal request." {n}For a brief moment, Sister Argenta's voice sounds hesitant.{/n}

languages.text: “你好，行商浪人！我有个私人请求想和你谈谈。”{n}有那么一瞬间，阿洁塔修女的声音听起来有些犹豫。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Rogue Trader! I was hoping to approach you with a personal request." {n}For a brief moment, Sister Argenta's voice sounds hesitant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你好，行商浪人！我有个私人请求想和你谈谈。”{n}有那么一瞬间，阿洁塔修女的声音听起来有些犹豫。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Saludos, Comerciante Independiente! Quería presentarle una petición personal». {n}Por un momento, la voz de la Hermana Argenta es dubitativa.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Rogue Trader! I was hoping to approach you with a personal request." {n}For a brief moment, Sister Argenta's voice sounds hesitant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Saludos, Comerciante Independiente! Quería presentarle una petición personal». {n}Por un momento, la voz de la Hermana Argenta es dubitativa.{/n}

languages.text: 「ごきげんよう、自由開拓者！個人的な頼みがあるのですが…」{n}一瞬、シスター・アルジェンタがどこかためらうような声音で告げてくる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Rogue Trader! I was hoping to approach you with a personal request." {n}For a brief moment, Sister Argenta's voice sounds hesitant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ごきげんよう、自由開拓者！個人的な頼みがあるのですが…」{n}一瞬、シスター・アルジェンタがどこかためらうような声音で告げてくる。{/n}

languages.text: "Seid gegrüßt, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}! Ich hatte gehofft, Euch mit einer persönlichen Bitte behelligen zu dürfen." {n}Für einen kurzen Moment klingt Schwester Argentas Stimme zögerlich.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Rogue Trader! I was hoping to approach you with a personal request." {n}For a brief moment, Sister Argenta's voice sounds hesitant.{/n}

languages.text: « Salutations, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ! J'espérais vous présenter une requête personnelle. » {n}L'espace d'un instant, vous percevez de l'hésitation dans la voix de sœur Argenta.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Rogue Trader! I was hoping to approach you with a personal request." {n}For a brief moment, Sister Argenta's voice sounds hesitant.{/n}

languages.text: "Selamlar Hür Tacir! Müsaadenle hususi bir ricada bulunmak istiyorum." {n}Rahibe Argenta'nın sesindeki tereddüt, bir anlığına kendini hissettiriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Rogue Trader! I was hoping to approach you with a personal request." {n}For a brief moment, Sister Argenta's voice sounds hesitant.{/n}
